source.180e5ae7:
path = '../input/wholesale-customers-data-set/'
Wholesale_data_path = path + 'Wholesale customers data.csv'

df_Wholesale = pd.read_csv(Wholesale_data_path)
source.84cada7a:
# Variable with the Longitude and Latitude
X=df_Wholesale.loc[:,['Channel','Detergents_Paper','Delicassen']]
X.head(10)
source.b22ecd9c:
K_clusters = range(1,10)
kmeans = [KMeans(n_clusters=i) for i in K_clusters]
Y_axis = df_Wholesale[['Detergents_Paper']]
X_axis = df_Wholesale[['Delicassen']]
score = [kmeans[i].fit(Y_axis).score(Y_axis) for i in range(len(kmeans))]
# Visualize
plt.plot(K_clusters, score)
plt.xlabel('Number of Clusters')
plt.ylabel('Score')
plt.title('Elbow Curve')
plt.show()
source.27442dcc:
kmeans = KMeans(n_clusters = 4, init ='k-means++')
kmeans.fit(X[X.columns[1:3]]) # Compute k-means clustering.
X['cluster_label'] = kmeans.fit_predict(X[X.columns[1:3]])
centers = kmeans.cluster_centers_ # Coordinates of cluster centers.
labels = kmeans.predict(X[X.columns[1:3]]) # Labels of each point
source.e04c558e:
X.plot.scatter(x = 'Detergents_Paper', y = 'Delicassen', c=labels, s=50, cmap='viridis')
plt.scatter(centers[:, 0], centers[:, 1], c='black', s=100, alpha=0.5)
